answers.answer: Blood sugar levels should be less than 120 within 2 hours after eating.I'd let them go ahead and do the fasting check on her.  Fasting levels should be less than 100.My son was diagnosed with Type I diabetes at the age of 10.  The sooner you get your daughter diagnosed and on treatment, the better.

question: My daughter ( 7 yrs old) had her blood sugar tested at a dr appointment yesterday. It was taken about 4 hours after eating. It came back at 133. The dr wants to do a fasting check on her. Are her levels high?
title: 7 year olds blood sugar level
